src.models.byol module

byol.py

Description: Implementation of BYOL with an EfficientNet convolutional backbone,

using Lightly.AI and PyTorch Lightning.

class src.models.byol.BYOL(img_size=(256, 256), optimizer='adamw', lr=0.05, momentum=0.9, weight_decay=0.0005, effnet_name='efficientnet-b0', *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: LightningModule

BYOL for self-supervised learning.

training_step(train_batch, batch_idx)[source]

Training step

Parameters:

  • train_batch (tuple of ((torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor), dict)) – Contains paired (augmented) images and metadata dict. Each image tensor is of the shape: - (B, 3, H, W)

  • batch_idx (int) – Training batch index

Returns:

Loss for training batch

Return type:

torch.FloatTensor
